chapter.title: The Pages
chapter.para: The GUI contains a number of pages with special functionality

section.title: Package Page
section.para: The package page is used for working with packages

section.title: Queue Page
section.para: The queue page is giving an overview over the packages there are selected for some kind of action like installation, updating or removal.
The packages can be moved from the queue, by selecting them in then view and pressing the Remove
